context.prior_knowledge: Basic e-learning platform usage experience and familiarity with secondary education curricula

learning_goals: Three or more perceived usefulness factors of e-learning can be identified using survey tools
The influence of learning environments, lecture delivery methods, tutor characteristics, and support conditions can be explained by interpreting structural equation modeling (SEM) analysis results
